text: Hey Gurpreet :slightly_smiling_face: How was your holiday break? Hope you caught some sweet videos!
Something that came to mind (Although I'm not sure how much spare time you currently have) is entering a little event or competition that requires you to utilise some kind of engineering skill

I was speaking with a colleague and he mentioned he saw a CV where the candidate had no real work experience but had shown interest by entering a robotics competition in London. Sounded like both a fun activity but also something that can help you show your interest in the engineering space, even if it isn't necessarily directly related to flying/planes

It was great I enjoyed holidays and had fun and you?

That looks interesting in robotics, I don't really got time because it's like full time study, only on weekends I am free.
